title: GIFT City-like hub for Karnataka, state IT minister Priyank Kharge tells FM
description: Karnataka IT-BT minister Priyank Kharge told finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman that such a central business district in Karnataka will foster economic growth and create jobs, and also attract foreign investment.
content: Karnataka’s IT-BT minister Priyank Kharge met country’s finance minister (FM) Nirmala Sitharaman on Friday to request assistance in replicating Gujarat state’s GIFT City model in Karnataka.
cleaned_content: karnataka s it bt minister priyank kharge met country s finance minister fm nirmala sitharaman on friday to request assistance in replicating gujarat state s gift city model in karnataka
